title: No train service between City Hall & Jurong East due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 市政厅站至裕廊东站之间因轨道故障暂停服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api antara City Hall & Jurong East kerana kerosakan landasan
title_translations.ta: City Hall மற்றும் Jurong East இடையே ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: [EWL]UPDATE:Fault cleared, trains are progressively returning to normal speed.
[EWL]: Due to a track fault near JurongEast, pls add 10 mins travel time from #CityHall to #JurongEast. Train service is still available.
